# War Declaration Procedures In the event of a station-wide war declaration made by enemy forces, the Command should immediately set the station alert to [color=#ba65c]Red Alert[/color].
65. All weapon restrictions are lifted, contraband permitted, and all station personnel should be alerted of this (if not already understood). Station AI, Cyborgs, and Beepsky/Security Bots, should be alerted of this as well.
65. Cargo Department should focus on acquiring as many weapons as possible for station personnel.
65. Cargo Department should focus on acquiring as many materials for the station as possible.
65. Research Department should focus on fabricating weaponry and technology to aid in station defense.
65. Erecting barricades and defense points is recommended to all personnel.
65. Command and Security should operate in tandem to secure nuclear devices.
65. In the event of a successful defense, if the station is relatively undamaged, shift should operate as normal.
65. In the event of the station being extremely damaged, or Command falling and nuclear devices ending up in enemy hands, the evacuation shuttle should be called.
